product_name: The North Face Abby IV Luxe Winter Boots - Women's
long_description: Warmth, function and fashion combine in the insulated, waterproof Abby IV Luxe winter boots from The North Face. Waterproof full-grain leather uppers and luxuriously soft faux fur keep your feet dry and warm despite foul weather. 200g PrimaLoft(R) Eco polyester fiber insulation keeps feet cozy; PrimaLoft Eco uses a minimum of 50% recycled materials in combination with standard PrimaLoft fibers. Drop-in EVA midsoles supply cushioning and shock absorption for wear all day long. Thermoplastic urethane shanks provide stability and support and help reduce cold-temperature conductivity. TNF Winter Grip(TM) rubber outsoles supply tenacious traction in wet, slick conditions; omnidirectional lugs are both grippy and self-cleaning. Temperature-sensitive Ice Pick(TM) rubber lugs on outsoles harden when temps fall below freezing, providing extra bite into the terrain.
short_description: Warmth, function and fashion combine in the insulated, waterproof Abby IV Luxe winter boots from The North Face.
